Content.Data:
Please contact Security Innovation support for help upgrading your internal instance of TEAM Mentor to 4.0 version. Security Innovation support experts will work with you to ensure a smooth upgrade. TEAM Mentor 4.0 is a significant re-design and re-architecture of TEAM Mentor and we suggest expert handling of the upgrade. Note that your user credentials and other configuration will remain the same after the upgrade.
Please contact Security Innovation [[/article/323dae88-b74b-465c-a949-d48c33f4ac85|support]].
